item.title: crackmes.one (5ca5c1ac33c5d4419da556de) (.NET) (Very Easy)
item.description: After downloading and extracting the crackme, Detect It Easy verifies it is a .NET executable. On my FLARE VM, I put the program in the dotNET directory. I’ll be using the “ILSpy” utility. After dragging and dropping, expanding InfoSecInstitute_dotNET_Reversing and going to Form1 will give us a decompilation. As you can see, the password is pretty much right there and that’s all we need to do for this crackme. If we look at the program itself, it consists of a simple popup where you input a password and press the check button.
